ComicInfo.Title: Diary of Doom!; The Haunted Arrow!; The Giant From Earth!; The Ghost of the Coal Mine!
ComicInfo.Summary:
John Mason leaves behind a diary detailing how he tried to help his friend Bob Trant who was a roaming monster, but there is no sign of Mason to be found.
Archer Tom Starr dreams of a curse placed on his ancestor by a Native American, a curse that now targets him.
George Dirk kills Jed Blaine to steal his treasure, but in digging for the treasure he digs his own grave.
